org.fax4j.util

Class ReflectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fax4j.util.ReflectionHelper

  • public final class ReflectionHelper
extends Object
    Holds general functions for working with reflection and dynamic invocation of code/classes.
    Since:
    0.40.6
    Version:
    1.02
    Author:
    Sagie Gur-Ari
